props.name: alt
props.description: Used in combination with src or srcSet to provide an alt attribute

props.name: children
props.description: Used to render icon or text elements inside the Avatar

props.name: imgProps
props.description: Attributes applied to the img element if the component is used to display an image

props.name: sizes
props.description: The sizes attribute for the img element

props.name: src
props.description: The src attribute for the img element

props.name: srcSet
props.description: The srcSet attribute for the img element
